content:
As we discussed today, we'll be reducing the frequency of the main GL SIG meeting to once a month as more of the work and discussion moves into subgroups. To keep the flow of communication across subgroups going, we'll be asking for a more in-depth update from each subgroup at this monthly meeting.

As we move from biweekly to once a month, we need to pick which Tuesday each month we meet. If you have a preference for the first, second, or third Tuesday please comment below.

Thanks!
